TMP0030: Can I use Vivipic for free?
TMP0031: Of course! You can create designs by freely accessing all our templates, graphics, elements, and more. If you want to enjoy our high-quality background remover and additional cloud storage, you will have to upgrade to Vivipic pro.
TMP0032: I have subscribed for Vivipic Pro. What could I do if I run out of background remover credits or cloud storage?
TMP0033: If you have used up all your background remover credits (100 credits) or cloud storage (100 GB) and need more, please contact us at service@vivipic.com.
TMP0034: What could I do if I have questions using your tools or want to provide advices?
TMP0035: Please feel free to dm our fan page https://www.facebook.com/vivipicus or email us at service@vivipic.com.
TMP0036: What payment methods do you support?
TMP0037: Major Credit Cards, such as Visa, and Mastercard are supported.
TMP0038: If I change my mind, what could I do?
TMP0039: You can cancel your Vivipic pro at any time and your plan will remain active until your next renewal date.
